surprised-pikachu.name: Surprised Pikachu
surprised-pikachu.use_case: When unexpected patient death occurs, organ failure despite treatment, or catastrophic lab results

dramatic-chipmunk.name: Dramatic Chipmunk
dramatic-chipmunk.use_case: For dramatic reveals of diagnosis, sudden patient deterioration

shocked-cat.name: Shocked/Wide-Eyed Cat
shocked-cat.use_case: When test results are unexpectedly bad, sudden cardiac arrest

unsettled-tom.name: Unsettled Tom
unsettled-tom.use_case: When imaging shows concerning findings, abnormal ECG patterns

scared-hamster.name: Scared Hamster
scared-hamster.use_case: For anaphylactic shock, severe allergic reactions, medical emergencies

disaster-girl.name: Disaster Girl
disaster-girl.use_case: For complications caused by medical errors, iatrogenic harm

blinking-white-guy.name: Blinking White Guy (Drew Scanlon)
blinking-white-guy.use_case: When patient symptoms don't match diagnosis, confusing lab results

michael-jordan-crying.name: Michael Jordan Crying
michael-jordan-crying.use_case: Terminal diagnosis, patient death, treatment failure

monkey-puppet.name: Monkey Puppet Looking Away
monkey-puppet.use_case: Awkward medical errors, avoiding difficult conversations with patients

pepe-sad.name: Pepe Sad/Crying
pepe-sad.use_case: Poor prognosis, chronic illness diagnosis, treatment side effects

press-f.name: Press F to Pay Respects
press-f.use_case: Patient death, organ death, cell death

coffin-dance.name: Coffin Dance Pallbearers
coffin-dance.use_case: Patient death, end of life, failed resuscitation

arthurs-fist.name: Arthur's Fist
arthurs-fist.use_case: Frustration with non-compliant patients, treatment resistance

mind-blown.name: Head Exploding/Mind Blown
mind-blown.use_case: Shocking diagnosis, unexpected mechanism of disease

spongebob-head-out.name: SpongeBob Ight Imma Head Out
spongebob-head-out.use_case: Organ failure, cell death, system shutdown

homer-bushes.name: Homer Simpson Backing Into Bushes
homer-bushes.use_case: Immune system retreat, organ failure, cell apoptosis

interstellar-51-years.name: This Little Maneuver Cost Us 51 Years
interstellar-51-years.use_case: Long-term complications, years lost to disease

patrick-push-it.name: Patrick Push It Somewhere Else
patrick-push-it.use_case: Metastasis, cancer spreading to other organs

pablo-escobar.name: Pablo Escobar Waiting Alone
pablo-escobar.use_case: Waiting for organ transplant, treatment delays

waiting-skeleton.name: Waiting Skeleton on Bench
waiting-skeleton.use_case: Long wait times for treatment, organ transplant waitlist

confused-math-lady.name: Confused Math Lady (Nazaré Tedesco)
confused-math-lady.use_case: Complex pathophysiology, confusing lab values, paradoxical reactions

is-this-a-pigeon.name: Is This a Pigeon?
is-this-a-pigeon.use_case: Misdiagnosis, confusing symptoms for different disease

expanding-brain.name: Galaxy Brain/Expanding Brain
expanding-brain.use_case: Increasingly complex medical reasoning, treatment escalation

two-buttons.name: Two Buttons Daily Struggle
two-buttons.use_case: Treatment dilemmas, choosing between two bad options

american-chopper-argument.name: American Chopper Argument
american-chopper-argument.use_case: Medical team disagreements, conflicting treatment approaches

same-picture.name: They're the Same Picture
same-picture.use_case: Similar looking conditions, differential diagnosis confusion

drake-hotline-bling.name: Drake Yes/No (Hotline Bling)
drake-hotline-bling.use_case: Correct vs incorrect diagnosis, effective vs ineffective treatment

tuxedo-winnie-pooh.name: Winnie the Pooh Tuxedo
tuxedo-winnie-pooh.use_case: Basic vs advanced treatment, proper medical terminology

well-yes-but-no.name: Well Yes, But Actually No
well-yes-but-no.use_case: Technically correct but clinically wrong, paradoxical answers

success-kid.name: Success Kid
success-kid.use_case: Treatment success, positive outcomes, patient recovery

one-does-not-simply.name: One Does Not Simply
one-does-not-simply.use_case: Medical impossibilities, things that cannot be done

anakin-padme.name: Anakin Padmé (For the Better, Right?)
anakin-padme.use_case: Good intentions with bad outcomes, treatment complications

hide-the-pain-harold.name: Hide the Pain Harold
hide-the-pain-harold.use_case: Chronic pain, long-term suffering, managing symptoms

this-is-fine.name: This Is Fine Dog
this-is-fine.use_case: Ignoring symptoms, denial of disease progression

spongebob-tired.name: SpongeBob Tired/Exhausted
spongebob-tired.use_case: Chronic fatigue, sleep disorders, exhaustion from illness

kermit-tea.name: Kermit Sipping Tea (But That's None of My Business)
kermit-tea.use_case: Passive comments about patient non-compliance, obvious causes

evil-kermit.name: Evil Kermit
evil-kermit.use_case: Temptation to skip medication, non-compliance thoughts

distracted-boyfriend.name: Distracted Boyfriend
distracted-boyfriend.use_case: Choosing wrong diagnosis over correct one, distracted by zebras

left-exit-12.name: Left Exit 12 Off Ramp
left-exit-12.use_case: Choosing between treatment paths, correct vs incorrect approach

buff-doge-vs-cheems.name: Buff Doge vs Cheems
buff-doge-vs-cheems.use_case: Past vs present health, strong vs weak immune response

spiderman-pointing.name: Spider-Man Pointing at Spider-Man
spiderman-pointing.use_case: Similar looking diseases, identical symptoms different causes
